name: com.almond.2048engine
description:
2048 game core

Template for 2048 game
-You can custom vertical-horizontal count

Contain samples
- Console : Play game and show game board in console window.
- 2D : Play game and Show board in game UI.

samples.description:
2048 game sample for console.
You can check the game board in the console window.
Log is output when the game ends
**Play using arrow keys.**

2048 game sample by 2D UI.
You can check the game board in UI
Log is output when the game ends
**Play using arrow keys.**
